oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Status on physical and cultural weed control methods for field crops in Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: European research in physical and cultural weed control methods has largely been driven by national pesticide policies and an increasing conversion to organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, B. (2007) Status on physical and cultural weed control methods for field crops in Europe. Paper at: Novel and Sustainable Weed Management in Arid and Semi-Arid Ecosystems, Rehovet, Israel, October.
